turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to order me a drink from Starbucks please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which starbucks would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Kemp & Kell in Wichita Falls.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande Iced Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want added to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like a splash of honey before they pour the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add cinnamon powder to the top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have that put in is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tell them not to put too much ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is there a specific time you want this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have it by lunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will mention that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay the drink is at kemp & kell and will be ready by noon, and the receipt has been emailed to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
